idea-plugin.name: Copy & Browse as Github Path
idea-plugin.description:
For projects with git repos in the base, it allows you to copy the current file's path on either master or the current branch and open it with the default browser.
Handy when you want to quickly navigate to a file in Intellij and then copy the Github link (including line number) to share with someone else as a URL.

action.description: Copy and open the URL to this file in Github, assuming the master branch

action.text: Copy URL and Open Github (Current Branch)
action.description: Copy and open the URL to this file in Github, using the current branch
